ComicInfo.Summary: IDW and the Karney boys Bryan Johnson and Walter Flanagan bring you the second installment of what's sure to be this year's favorite Nazi/zombie/famous monster comic; War of the Undead. With Dracula, Frankenstein's monster and the Werewolf now in place, a sinister SS doctor's plan to reclaim Hitler's soul from Hell is hours away. The world's greatest monsters aren't exactly cooperative and with a Nazi controlled army of undead soldiers at the ready, the stage is set for some serious hand-to- claw combat. The old adage "War is hell" has never been more true!
